name: The Events Calendar PRO Alarm
author: Andy Fragen

sections.description:
Are you using The Events Calendar PRO plugin? Do you wish that you could add an alarm or alert to any event?

Simple, just install The Events Calendar PRO Alarm and in the Settings page for The Events Calendar PRO add an Additional Field for Alarms.

Now when you download and install the events .ics file on your calendar an alert before the event will sound.

Development on GitHub. Pull requests are welcome.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire /the-events-calendar-pro-alarm/ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. The plugin will automatically add the required Additional Field. If you wish to change or add additional time set points, just follow the usual instructions under Additional Fields.
sections.faq:
Does the plugin require the paid The Events Calendar PRO plugin?

Yes. Events Calendar PRO is written by Modern Tribe, Inc.

It also requires The Events Calendar plugin.

Where can I report bugs?

Add a new topic on the WordPress Support Forum.

  • added class Autoloader, requires PHP 5.3 or greater as autoloader class requires namespacing
  • class aliases for users of ECP 3.9 or lower
  • renamed directory and class names to allow for PSR 4 loading
  • add .pot file for translations

short_description: Add alarm/alert to iCal feed created from The Events Calendar PRO plugin.
description:

Now when you download and install the events .ics file on your calendar an alert before the event will sound.

Development on GitHub. Pull requests are welcome.

upgrade_notice: Please stay current with your WordPress installation, your active theme, and your plugins and especially The Events Calendar and The Events Calendar PRO plugins.
